xmlText.p: COMMISSIONER'S OFFICE — Suspended Cincinnati RHP Jake Ehret (Louisville-IL) 50 games and Cleveland OF Carlos Ventura (DSL Indians) 72 games for violations of the Minor League Drug Prevention and Treatment Program.<
BALTIMORE ORIOLES — Placed LHP Zach Britton on the 60-day DL.
TEXAS RANGERS — Agreed to terms with RHP Edinson Volquez on a minor league contract.<
CHICAGO CUBS — Agreed to terms with RHP Shae Simmons on a one-year contract. Placed LHP Drew Smyly on the 60-da DL.
MILWAUKEE BREWERS — Agreed to terms with SS Nick Franklin and LHP Wade Miley on minor league contracts.
PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES — Agreed to terms with RHP Drew Hutchison on a minor league contract.
ST. LOUIS CARDINALS — Designated RHP Rowan Wick for assignment.<
SUSSEX COUNTY MINERS — Released C JJ Fernandez.<
EVANSVILLE OTTERS — Traded SS Christopher Riopedre to Rockland (Can-Am) for a player to be named. Signed RHP Mitchell Aker and SS Austin Homan.
NORMAL CORNBELTERS — Signed LHP Matt Portland to a contract extension.
RIVER CITY RASCALS — Signed SS Dylan Woods.
TRAVERSE CITY BEACH BUMS — Signed RHP Justin Finan.<
DELAWARE 87ERS — Acquired G Kyle Randall from the available player pool.<
CAROLINA PANTHERS — Reinstated general manager Marty Hurney.
DETROIT LIONS — Named Hank Fraley assistant offensive line coach and Evan Rothstein research and analytics assistant.<
INDIANAPOLIS COLTS — Named Matt Eberflus defensive coordinator, Nick Sirianni offensive coordinator, Bubba Ventrone special teams coordinator and Rusty Jones director of sports performance.
KANSAS CITY CHIEFS— Signed CB David Amerson.
WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS — Signed DE Craig Roh to a two-year contract.<
CALGARY FLAMES — Signed C Mikael Backlund to a six-year contract.
COLORADO AVALANCHE — Assigned F Julien Nantel from San Antonio (AHL) to Colorado (ECHL).
DALLAS STARS — Recalled F Jason Dickinson from Texas (AHL).
LOS ANGELES KINGS — Recalled F Spencer Watson from Manchester (ECHL) to Ontario (AHL).
MINNESOTA WILD — Assigned G Steve Michalek from Iowa (AHL) to Rapid City (ECHL). Recalled G Adam Vay from Rapids City to Iowa.
MONTREAL CANADIENS — Assigned G Zachary Fucale from Laval (AHL) to Brampton (ECHL).
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Placed F John Quenneville on injured reserve, retroactive to Feb. 10.
NEW YORK RANGERS — Assigned F Vinni Lettieri to Hartford (AHL). Recalled G Brandon Halverson form Hartford.<
CLEVELAND MONSTERS — Returned F Michael Kirkpatrick on loan to Florida (ECHL).
ROCKFORD ICEHOGS — Assigned F Alex Wideman to Indy (ECHL).
SAN ANTONIO RAMPAGE — Assigned F Brady Shaw to Colorado (ECHL) and F Jake Marchment to Utah (ECHL).
TUCSON ROADRUNNERS — Assigned F Artur Tyanulin to Fort Wayne (ECHL).<
ECHL — Suspended Worcester G Eamon McAdam two games.
ATLANTA GLADIATORS — Signed F Garrett Milan.
CINCINNATI CYCLONES — Signed D Eric Diodati to an amateur tryout agreement.
UTAH GRIZZLIES — Released F Nate Mitton.
WHEELING NAILERS — Signed Fs Bryan Arneson and Ryan Marcuz.
WORCESTER RAILERS — Signed D Chris Saracino. Added G Chris Habazin as emergency backup.<
ATLANTA UNITED — Traded the discovery rights to M Alejandro Romero Gamarra to the N.Y. Red Bulls for general allocation money.
D.C. UNITED — Signed D Chris Odoi-Atsem to a one-year contract.<
CHATTANOOGA — Named Jeremiah Wilson cornerbacks coach.
DUKE — Promoted Ben Albert and Matt Guerrieri to co-defensive coordinators. Named Lanier Goethie assistant football coach.
KANSAS STATE — Announced the retirement of defensive coordinator Tom Hayes. Named Blake Seiler defensive coordinator.
LA SALLE — Announced the resignation of field hockey coach Michelle Marks Salmi.
MEMPHIS — Named Scott Symons inside linebackers coach.
MICHIGAN STATE — Signed football coach Mark Dantonio to a one-year contract extension through the 2023 season.
